entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 8:14 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
